derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French médiante, from Italian mediante 'coming between', present participle of obsolete mediare 'come between', from late Latin mediare 'be in the middle of'

means.word_mean: 1. (music) the third note of a diatonic scale; midway between the tonic and the dominant
